parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "documento": {{ JSON.stringify($('Process State Logic').first().json.allSessions[$('Process State Logic').first().json.chatId].datos.dni) }},
  "telefono": {{ JSON.stringify($('Process State Logic').first().json.chatId.replace('@c.us', '')) }},
  "idEspecialidad": {{ $('Process State Logic').first().json.allSessions[$('Process State Logic').first().json.chatId].datos.especialidad.idEspecialidad }},
  "dias": [{{ $('Process State Logic').first().json.allSessions[$('Process State Logic').first().json.chatId].datos.diaSeleccionado.id }}],
  "rangosHorarios": [{{ $('Process State Logic').first().json.allSessions[$('Process State Logic').first().json.chatId].datos.horarioSeleccionado.id }}]
}
